==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|もん|じ|yomi=o}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=もんじ}} compound {{m|zh|文字|tr=mjun dzi<sup>H</sup>|lit=writing + character}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''man<sup>4</sup> zi<sup>6</sup>''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|もんじ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もんじ}}

# a [[letter]], a [[character]] {{gloss|symbol for a sound or a word}}
# {{lb|ja|linguistics|sort=もじ}} [[script]], [[writing system]]
# {{qualifier|specific to Japanese}} a written [[mora]], a [[kana]]
# [[writing]] in general, [[written]] [[words]]
# {{qualifier|by extension from the “writing” sense}} a [[document]]
# {{qualifier|by extension from the “writing” sense}} [[reading]] and [[writing]]
# {{qualifier|by extension from the “writing” sense}} [[studies]]

=====Usage notes=====
This reading is less common than ''moji'' below.

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=もじ|もん|k1=も|じ}}
{{IPAchar|/mond͡ʑi/}} → {{IPAchar|/mod͡ʑi/}}

Sound shift from ''monji'' above.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|もじ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もじ}}

# a [[letter]] or [[character]] {{gloss|symbol for a sound or a word}}
# {{lb|ja|linguistics|sort=もじ}} [[script]], [[writing system]]
# {{qualifier|specific to Japanese}} a written [[mora]], a [[kana]]
# [[writing]] in general, [[written]] [[words]]
# {{qualifier|by extension from the “writing” sense}} a [[document]]
# {{qualifier|by extension from the “writing” sense}} [[reading]] and [[writing]]
# {{qualifier|by extension from the “writing” sense}} [[studies]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=もじ|chiefly|_|Kansai}} the [[tails]] side of a [[coin]], the side with [[writing]] on it
# {{lb|ja|sort=もじ|chiefly|_|Kansai|by extension}} a [[coin]], [[money]]

=====Usage notes=====
This reading is more common than ''monji'' above.

The {{m|en|tails}} and {{m|en|coin}}, {{m|en|money}} senses are specific to this ''moji'' reading.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

* {{ja-r|小文字|こもじ}}: [[lowercase]] [[letter]]
